text: 4:3 Efesus 2:2-3; 4:17; Taitus 3:3Ia fomɨra dughiar ruarimɨn navir ghurimɨn arazibar gɨn zui. Ia, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim puvatɨzibar arazir kurabar amuasa ifongezɨ moghɨn ia fomɨra arazir kabagh ami. Arazir kaba: me afiar arazibagh amuava, arazir mɨzɨrɨzibar amuasa bar kufi, egha dɨpar onganiba apava onganigha, isar dafabagh amua dagher avɨriba apava, egha pura gumazamiziba isa pura pamtemɨn diava, ighiar kurabar arazibagh ami, egha nguazir kamɨn biziba e God gami moghɨn uari isa dagh anɨdi, egha bizir kabagh amua aghumsɨziba puvatɨ.
